title: How do I add and remove an alarm?
answer: 1. Touch Clock > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110884). ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110885) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110886) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110887) 1. Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110888) to add an alarm. To set the alarm, perform the following operations: 1. Set the alarm time. 1. Set the alarm to repeat on certain days. 1. Set Ringtone for your alarm. 1. Set Vibrate on so that your phone vibrates when the alarm goes on. 1. Type the alarm name in the Label text box. 1. Touch DONE. [All alarms are listed on the Alarm screen. You can set any of the alarms on or off. To delete an alarm, press and hold the alarm and choose Delete alarm from the shortcut menu. ]()
